context: After wrapping up in England, production travelled to <a4_0>Morocco<a4_0/> in June, with filming taking place in <a0_0>Oujda, Tangier and Erfoud<a0_0/>, after preliminary work was completed by the production's second unit. An explosion filmed in <b12_0>Morocco<b12_0/> holds a Guinness World Record for the "<a1_0><a5_0><b8_0><b13_0><b14_0>Largest film stunt explosion<b14_0/><b13_0/><b8_0/><a5_0/><a1_0/>" in cinematic history, with the record credited to production designer <a2_0><a7_0><b9_0>Chris Corbould<b9_0/><a7_0/><a2_0/>. Principal photography concluded on <b15_0>5 July 2015<b15_0/>. A <b10_0>wrap-up party<b10_0/> for Spectre was held in commemoration before entering post-production. <b11_0>Filming<b11_0/> took <a3_0><a6_0>128 days<a3_0/>.
